title: factor out TestCorePlus(Queries|Extensions)Parser from TestParser, rename TestParser to TestCoreParser
description: Tests for the xml query parser in SOLR-839 for example could then be extending the TestParser or TestCorePlusQueriesParser or TestCorePlusExtensionsParser depending on requirements.
